StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: *13+ years of total IT experience in analysis, design & development of database and data warehouse projects *7+ yearsexperienceinETLarchitecture, / PowerMartandDataStage tools *8+ years experience in technical lead roles in ETL / data warehousing / data migration projects ;

PositionHistory.Title: Data Architect
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: BE 1.3 UI Upgrade
Citi'sGlobalTransactionServices (GTS) movesover $3trillioninfinancialflowsdaily, serving70,000clientsacross140counties including 99% of Fortune Top 100 companies and national governments of 120 counties.
TheBE1.. Sincethemigrationdidnotinvolve transactionaldataandthevolumewaslow, noETLtoolwasutilized. Rather, theimportlogicwasfullyencodedinPL/ SQLcode. The source data was exposed via materialized views.
Responsibilities: * Led the development effort with assistance from a team of three others. ; * Responsible for the design and architecture of the complete framework involving complex migration logic. ; * Tracked and Coordinated code deployment cycles for 18 different environments. ; * Worked closely with numerous other teams such as business, requirements, application development, production support, DBAs, builds etc. for day to day activities. * Drastically reduced code and development effort by creating highly modularized, parameterized, and generic PL SQL code for executing sequences of import queries. Since the migration could be run in multiple (8) scenarios, with the expectation of running different import queries in various scenarios, it was then only a matter of configuring which import queries where called in what sequence and in which scenario. * Created the world's best event logger - it logged and tracked everything from execution times to queries being run to parameters passed to each procedure block - this turned out to be a very useful feature for troubleshooting failures. * Responsible for performance of the system - the delivered system could perform a complete migration of a client and all corresponding child data from source (27 materialized views) to target (over 100 tables) involving fairly complex migration rules in under 1 second - while also performing over 100 data QC checks and making over 400 log entries in that 1 second - and capable of running up to 20 migrations in parallel.
Environment: Oracle 10g / Oracle 11g Team Size: Five

PositionHistory.Title: Data Warehouse Architect
PositionHistory.Description:
& Co. aimedatMcKinsey' industry. streams (suchasPatient / HRdata). ­dimensional .
consultants for benchmark and pattern analysis (areas of improvement etc.).
DespitebeingnewtotheETLtool (DataStage, asopposedtoInformatica), . During the project there was an environment upgrade from Oracle 10g / DataStage 7.5 to Oracle 11g / DataStage 8.1.
Responsibilities: * Led the technical team of ETL developers, data modelers, and database developers ; * Worked closely with the business analysts and the project sponsors to set expectation and review / refine requirements ; * Led all technical discussions regarding data flow, database / data warehouse architecture, and ETL design ; * Drastically reduced code and development effort by converting some input data files into EAV model format allowing for lesser number of ETL jobs.
* Further reduced code and development effort by configuring parameters and calculation queries to be passed to a single parameterized ETL job for calculating over 500 dashboard metrics and as many drillable charts * Performed proof of concept (POC) for various new ideas such configurable multi­dimensional Oracle OLAP Cubes, Lookup Management via CSV files * Created an Automated Execution and Testing module called kiXTArt that enabled a test­driven development environment allowing us to focus on the actual development efforts * Coordinated between development, data engineering, and business teams matching development efforts with business requirements * * Used the Agile Scrum methodology to produce quick results on prioritized development backlog Designed Server, Parallel, Batch jobs in DataStage using various Stages available (Transformer, Aggregator, Hashed File etc.); wrote a lot of job control code for purposes of custom integration * Created Shell / AWK / Perl scripts to transfer, archive, and process (unzip / decrypt / horizontal­vertical transpose) data files
Environment: DataStage 7.5 / DataStage 8.1, Oracle 10g / Oracle 11g, UNIX AIX Team Size: Eight

PositionHistory.Title: Project Lead
Data Warehouse Architect
Data Architect
Data Migration Lead / ETL Developer
Senior ETL Developer
ETL Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: ERP Data Migration
René Lezard is a medium­sized German fashion group .This project was aimed to develop a central data warehouse to integrate legacy system with new A2000 ERP system in the US. This was basically a migration project to new ERP system as well as integrating with legacy system for production data. I participated in full data warehouse design & development, deployment, ETL process using Informatica.
Responsibilities: * Participated in all phases including Requirement Analysis, Client Interaction, Design, Coding, Testing and Documentation ; * Converted user defined functions of business process into Informatica defined functions ; * Developedandsupporttheextraction, transformationandloadprocess (ETL) foraDataWarehousefromtheirlegacy systems using Informatica and provide technical support and hands­on mentoring in the use of Informatica * /UserlevelPrivileges, SchedulingJobsbasedontargetsystem dependencies * Oracle Database Design and development ; * Developed PL/SQL procedures, functions, packages for scrubbing data ; * Created Informatica mappings with PL/SQL procedures to build business rules to load data ; * DevelopedInformaticaSCDType­I, Type­. Extensivelyused , StoredProcedures, UpdateStrategy, mapplets and others. * Design and development of UNIX Shell Scripts to handle pre and post session processes. ; * Involved in writing test scripts, unit testing, system testing and documentation
Environment: Informatica Power Center 7.1.2, Oracle 8i, UNIX Sun Solaris 8, UNIX Shell Scripting, TOAD, SQL Team Size: Five

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Database / ETL Developer
Sr. Database Developer
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: Application Maintenance Support (AMS) for Project Independence and Project Everest
AMSwasa24/7ProductionSupportprojectforAgilent. SiebelwithTIBCOasthemiddleware, . Majoractivitiesincludedenhancements and maintenance including bug fixing, data fixing, modification of existing programs, and product enhancements.
Responsibilities: * 24/, Reports, andWorkflowsinvariousmodulesofthe Application. * Support for Conversions, and Interfaces that handles inbound and outbound data to their numerous boundary systems. ; * Development and Support of Consumer Facing Documents (Invoices, Shipping Labels, Pick Slips, etc) using Reports 6i. ; * Developed PL/SQL procedures to correct data problems on Customer database. ; * Tuning SQL Queries ; * Viewing, Sorting, Updating, and Managing of Query Tickets on Kintana ; * In­depth user analysis, eliciting requirements out of user discussions, change requests, re­engineering some mainframe based legacy modules. * Rebuild the Indexes to improve space utilization. ; * Innovative programming & design ideas, which contributed to implementation of some crucial business features including a complex rule­based business engine. * Managing Users, Responsibilities, and Profile Settings, Running weekly scripts, and managing with the DBAs.
Environment: Oracle8i, OracleApplications11i (OM, MFG, INV, PO, WIP, MPS), Forms6i, Reports6i, SQL, PL/SQL, WindowsXP, UNIX, Kintana, TIBCO Team Size: Forty Five

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Naresh Mulchandani has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 20 years. Currently he is employed as a Data Architect at Citigroup Inc. Naresh has extensive knowledge of ETL, SQL, Oracle PL/SQL, Cognos Impromptu, Ascential DataStage, Oracle, Microsoft SQL*Loader, Informatica Analytics Package > Informatica PowerCenter, XML, Informatica, UNIX, Oracle 9i, Oracle 10G, Sun Solaris, Oracle Applications, Oracle 8i, Oracle 11g, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, Data Migration, XSLT, Oracle Report, Microsoft SQL Server, EDI, shell scripting, TOAD, SDLC, Rational ClearCase, Perl Programming, Oracle Forms, Informatica Analytics Package, IDE, Data Warehousing, Cognos Powerplay, AWK, Triggers Using PL, Stored Procedures, Scrum Methodology, Oracle Cost Management, ORACLE WIP, ORACLE QA, ORACLE PO, ORACLE OM, ORACLE INV, IDQ, Flat Files, AIX UNIX. Naresh has a considerable management experience (2.3 years).
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2008-11 for 16 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Project Lead/Data Warehouse Architect at GCS Software LLC. Since 2007-03 for 12 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Data Migration Lead / ETL Developer/Data Warehouse Architect at GCS Software LLC.
